{{Wired embedded system |brand=MYIR |model=Rico Board |revision=(MYS-4378-10) |is_manuf=Yes |price=99 |est_release_date=03/2015 |type=development board, single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM4378;AM4378BZDND100; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128JVEQ |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MTFC4GACAJCN-1M WT |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pad header,, unpopulated,, J8 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ9031RN |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=256Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;ON Semi;CAT24C256;;1;,,, HDMI Transmitter;Lattice Semiconductor;Sil9022A;;1;,,, HDMI Companion Chip w/ I2C Level Shifting Buffer;TI;TPD12S016;;1;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;2;,,, Single Buffer/Driver w/ Open-Drain Output;TI;SN74LVC1G07;;2;,,, P-Channel 2.5V Specified MOSFET;ON Semi;FDT434P;;1;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC1G08;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65218;;1;,,, 6V, 10A Rail Clamp Array;Littelfuse Inc;SP3050;;2; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, RGB LCD FPC, MIPI CPI, I2C, SPI, CAN, UART, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.10; |stock_os=Linux;3.12.10; |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui_eth=04:79:B7 }} {{TagLine|Rico Board}} :[http://www.myirtech.com/list.asp?id=510 Product page]
{{See also|List of SBCs|}}
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/03/03/myir-tech-announces-low-cost-rico-and-z-turn-boards-powered-by-ti-am437x-and-xilinx-zynq-7010-socs/ ''MYiR Tech Announces Low Cost Rico'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/io-rich-sbc-runs-linux-on-cortex-a9-sitara-soc/ ''I/O-rich SBC runs Linux on Cortex-A9 Sitara SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Specification=== *CPU: ''[[TI]]'' Sitara AM4378 @1.0GHz ARM (Cortex-A9) :4x PRU 32-bit Microcontrollers @200MHz *GPU: PowerVR SGX530 *Storage: 16MB (QSPI) Flash, :4GB eMMC, Micro SD (TF) slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) RAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *Power: 5V/2A
===See also=== :;[http://www.myirtech.com/product.asp?lx=big&anid=83 Single Board Computers] *[[MYIR MYS-6ULX-IOT]] *[[MYIR Rico Board]] *[[MYIR Z-turn Board]] *[[MYIR Z-turn Lite (Z7010)]]
